author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
pr93x

Calo Conditions configuration to reflect what currently used at P5.
It only contains 3 configuration files. 

Change w.r.t. currently in CMSSW Calo Conditions 2017_v1_8 :
- invoke 2nd EG Iso WP
- update Layer1 HFSF for the first 12 bins (from flat 0.7 to flat 1.0)
- MET PUS v6, changed from v4

To test it needs external PR https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TCalorimeter/pull/21
title: 93x - Present Calo conditions used at p5, for v2 L1 menu and post-MD2.
